## TableMapping type

Table mapping configuration using mutually exclusive approaches. Use EITHER legacy filter-based OR modern pipeline-based mapping, but not both.

The discriminated union ensures compile-time safety by preventing accidental mixing of the two approaches.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type TableMapping<TTable = Dict> = SimpleTableMapping<TTable> | PipelineTableMapping<TTable>;
```
**References:** [Dict](./zero-contracts.dict.md)<!-- -->, [SimpleTableMapping](./zero-contracts.simpletablemapping.md)<!-- -->, [PipelineTableMapping](./zero-contracts.pipelinetablemapping.md)
